name: Accounting Quest: The Black Debt
description:
This was a 12 week project undertaken during my game design course. The goal was to create an educational game with a demonstrable learning loop and serious viability as a teaching aid. Accounting Quest is my attempt at creating a game with fun mechanics and a diegetic learning environment.

Let me know what you think, if you have any feedback or questions come visit me at my website bitraidgames.com or email me at bitraidgames@gmail.com
